description: This is a track of the Sugar Daddy trail at the Sugarloaf Bike Park. This trail is an intermediate trail but still lots of fun.Go here for more information on hours of operations and feeshttp://www.sugarloafpark.ca/en/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=110&Itemid=135
directions: Buy your pass at the information center and take chair lift to top of mountain. Trail Head for Sugar Daddy will be on your left once you get off the chair lift.
title: Sugarloaf Bike Park Sugar Daddy
